title: fire cracker jinx causes lagging
body:
Hi 

I am not sure if it is just me or others have encountered this as well, everytime I used jinx fire cracker skin, the lagging would be very significant. It doesnt happen to my other champs or skins.

I was wondering what I should do in this situation.

Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey RedolenceofRain,

Thanks for reporting this. We'll investigate the issue and see what may be going on here. 

For now, I might suggest lowering your graphics settings when using this skin, as my first thought may be that you're lagging due to the particles being so heavy on Firecracker Jinx.
